SELECT m.cid,m.uid,m.zs from ( SELECT a.cid,a.uid,a.upload_time,((IFNULL(b.todayNum,0)+IFNULL(n.todayShareNum,0))*5+IFNULL(d.like_num,0)) zs from (SELECT a.cid,a.uid,a.upload_time FROM tab_content_info a where a.is_private=0 and a.c_status=0 and a.uid>1 and not exists(select 1 from tab_set_contentlist b where a.cid=b.cid and b.type=1) and not EXISTS (select 1 from tab_editor_contentrecommend e where a.cid=e.cid and e.recommend=1 )) a LEFT JOIN ( SELECT cid,count(*) todayNum from tab_user_likecontent where create_time>=1378712977671 GROUP BY cid) b on a.cid=b.cid LEFT JOIN ( SELECT cid,count(*) todayShareNum from tab_log_sharecontent where flag=1 and create_time>=1378712977671 GROUP BY cid ) n on a.cid=n.cid LEFT JOIN (SELECT cid,like_num from tab_stat_likecontent) d on a.cid=d.cid ) m ORDER BY m.zs DESC,m.upload_time DESC LIMIT 504

SELECT a.cid FROM tab_content_info a where a.is_private=0 and a.c_status=0 and a.uid>1 and not exists(select 1 from tab_set_contentlist b where a.cid=b.cid and b.type=2) and not EXISTS (select 1 from tab_editor_contentrecommend e where a.cid=e.cid and e.recommend=1 ) ORDER BY (show_times+show_falsetimes) DESC LIMIT 100

SELECT y.cid from ( SELECT a.cid,a.upload_time,( (IFNULL(m.todayLike,0)+IFNULL(n.todayForward,0)+IFNULL(x.todayShare,0))*3+(IFNULL(m.thirdLike,0)+IFNULL(n.thirdForward,0)+IFNULL(x.thirdShare,0))*2+(IFNULL(m.serventhLike,0)+IFNULL(n.serventhForward,0)+IFNULL(x.serventhShare,0))) zs from (SELECT a.cid,a.upload_time FROM tab_content_info_temp a where a.is_private=0 and a.c_status=0 and a.uid>1 and
a.serventhTime>#{time}
and not exists(select 1 from tab_set_contentlist b where a.cid=b.cid and b.type=2) and not EXISTS (select 1 from tab_editor_contentrecommend e where a.cid=e.cid and e.recommend=1 )) a LEFT JOIN( select a.cid,
sum(IF(a.create_time<b.firstTime,1,0)) todayLike, sum(IF(b.firstTime<a.create_time<b.thirdTime,1,0)) thirdLike, sum(IF(b.thirdTime<a.create_time<b.serventhTime,1,0)) serventhLike
from tab_user_likecontent a,tab_content_info_temp b where a.cid=b.cid and
b.serventhTime>#{time}
GROUP BY a.cid) m ON a.cid=m.cid LEFT JOIN( select a.cid,
sum(IF(a.create_time<b.firstTime,1,0)) todayForward, sum(IF(b.firstTime<a.create_time<b.thirdTime,1,0)) thirdForward, sum(IF(b.thirdTime<a.create_time<b.serventhTime,1,0)) serventhForward
from tab_user_forwardcontent a,tab_content_info_temp b where a.cid=b.cid and
b.serventhTime>#{time}
GROUP BY a.cid) n ON a.cid=n.cid LEFT JOIN( select a.cid,
sum(IF(a.create_time<b.firstTime,1,0)) todayShare, sum(IF(b.firstTime<a.create_time<b.thirdTime,1,0)) thirdShare, sum(IF(b.thirdTime<a.create_time<b.serventhTime,1,0)) serventhShare
from tab_log_sharecontent a,tab_content_info_temp b where a.cid=b.cid and a.flag=1 and
b.serventhTime>#{time}
GROUP BY a.cid) x ON a.cid=x.cid ) y ORDER BY y.zs DESC,y.upload_time ASC LIMIT 100
